body.heading: About this service
content: This service contains no ads whatsoever and is completely free of cost and open source. If you feel like supporting me, you can always leave a donation at [https://therealsuji.tk/donate](https://therealsuji.tk/donate).

body.heading: Contact us
content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact me:

- By email: [me@example.com](mailto:me@example.com)
- By visiting this page on our website: [https://example.com](https://example.com)
